title: EEG connectivity and network analyses predict outcome in patients with disorders of consciousness – A systematic review and meta-analysis
content:
Publication date: 30 May 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 10

Author(s): Danuta Szirmai, Arashk Zabihi, Tamás Kói, Péter Hegyi, Alexander Schulze Wenning, Marie Anne Engh, Zsolt Molnár, Gábor Csukly, András Attila Horváth
